400.title: Bad Request
400.description: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.description: You need to authenticate to access this resource.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Not Found
404.description: The shortened link you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.description: The request method is not supported for this resource.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.description: Too many requests. Please slow down and try again later.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.description: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
